mapper.insert: insert into announcement_file (announcement_file_id, create_time, file_addr, file_desc, announcement_id) values (#{announcementFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{announcementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select announcement_file_id, create_time, file_addr, file_desc, announcement_id from announcement_file
